column1: Harley Bramble is a Bree-men of Bree in The Lord of the Rings: War in the North. People in Bree didnt like Harley Bramble and they didnt treat him good. When Harley did meet a Southerners
column2: the southerner used this to stir him up against the other Bree-landers. If Harley would help the Southerners
column3: he would be running things in Bree at the end. When the two were confronted by Eradan (video game character)
column5: Harley did choose to stay on the good side.The Lord of the Rings: War in the North
